author: Nintendo of America
description:
Little Nightmares III is out now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/little-nightmares-iii-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 

Hold your hands tight and stay close. We're ready to welcome you back to the Nowhere, little ones.  

Play as Low and Alone, best friends ever since they found each other in this lonely nightmare. Now, they must survive and find a way out... 

#LittleNightmaresIII #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Little Nightmares III – Hold My Hand Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
